name: JCOLOR® GW-G18
description: JCOLOR® GW-G18 is among J Color’s new lines of products that are environmentally friendly with zero formaldehyde emissions during processing, heat and fade resistant. Furthermore, JCOLOR® GW-G series is engineered to have fine particle dimensions with narrow size distribution, rendering unique properties such as excellent dispersability and broad compatibility with a wide range of systems. JCOLOR® GW-G series is suitable for applications in various inks, paints, coatings, plastisols, crayons, and many other aqueous or non-aqueous systems.
